name: First Lunar Credit Union (FLCU)
description: A privacy-preserving payroll platform built on Aztec Network that enables employees to receive salaries privately, generate proofs of employment and income without revealing sensitive data, and access salary advances by pledging future earnings. Businesses can execute payroll onchain with complete privacy using USDC, USDT, eEUR, tGBP, and other stablecoins. Lenders can offer salary-backed loans with automatic pledge enforcement via smart contracts, eliminating default risk through trustless deductions at the protocol level.
features: Private salary payments on Aztec Network
Zero-knowledge proof of employment and income
Salary-backed lending with automatic pledge enforcement
